description: Provides the details necessary to create a configured audience model association.

parameters.name: membershipIdentifier
parameters.description: A unique identifier for one of your memberships for a collaboration. The configured audience model is associated to the collaboration that this membership belongs to. Accepts a membership ID.

parameters.name: configuredAudienceModelArn
parameters.description: A unique identifier for the configured audience model that you want to associate.

parameters.name: configuredAudienceModelAssociationName
parameters.description: The name of the configured audience model association.

parameters.name: manageResourcePolicies
parameters.description: When TRUE, indicates that the resource policy for the configured audience model resource being associated is configured for Clean Rooms to manage permissions related to the given collaboration. When FALSE, indicates that the configured audience model resource owner will manage permissions related to the given collaboration. Setting this to TRUE requires you to have permissions to create, update, and delete the resource policy for the cleanrooms-ml resource when you call the  DeleteConfiguredAudienceModelAssociation resource. In addition, if you are the collaboration creator and specify TRUE, you must have the same permissions when you call the  DeleteMember and  DeleteCollaboration APIs.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: An optional label that you can assign to a resource when you create it. Each tag consists of a key and an optional value, both of which you define. When you use tagging, you can also use tag-based access control in IAM policies to control access to this resource. (string) --- (string) ---

nested_items.name: configuredAudienceModelAssociation
nested_items.description: Information about the configured audience model association.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: A unique identifier of the configured audience model association.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the configured audience model association.

nested_items.name: configuredAudienceModelArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the configured audience model that was used for this configured audience model association.

nested_items.name: membershipId
nested_items.description: A unique identifier for the membership that contains this configured audience model association.

nested_items.name: membershipArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the membership that contains this configured audience model association.

nested_items.name: collaborationId
nested_items.description: A unique identifier of the collaboration that contains this configured audience model association.

nested_items.name: collaborationArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the collaboration that contains this configured audience model association.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the configured audience model association.

nested_items.name: manageResourcePolicies
nested_items.description: When TRUE, indicates that the resource policy for the configured audience model resource being associated is configured for Clean Rooms to manage permissions related to the given collaboration. When FALSE, indicates that the configured audience model resource owner will manage permissions related to the given collaboration.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description of the configured audience model association.

nested_items.name: createTime
nested_items.description: The time at which the configured audience model association was created.

nested_items.name: updateTime
nested_items.description: The most recent time at which the configured audience model association was updated.
